clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study of MTC896 Gel in Subjects With Acne
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Single-Blind, Phase 2 Study to Determine the Safety, Tolerability, and Systemic Exposure of 3 Dose Regimens of Topically Applied MTC896 Gel in Subjects With Acne Vulgaris

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the pharmacokinetic properties of topically applied MTC896 Gel following application of 0.75% (w/w) MTC896 Gel once daily and twice daily and 1.5% (w/w) once daily over 4 weeks in the treatment of acne.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic: maximum concentration (Cmax) of MTC896 in the plasma after 28 days of treatment
primary_outcome.description: The primary pharmacokinetic outcome measure will be the maximum concentration (Cmax) of MTC896 in the plasma after 28 days of treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety and tolerability: Adverse event incidence and severity, local tolerability, laboratory test results, vital signs, 12-lead electrocardiogram
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse event incidence and severity, local tolerability, laboratory test results (hematology, clinical chemistry, lipid profile, urinalysis), vital signs (systolic and diastolic blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate), 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG)

arm_group.description: Subjects will apply topically daily 0.75% (w/w) MTC896 Gel
Subjects will apply topically twice daily 0.75% (w/w) MTC896 Gel
Subjects will apply topically daily 1.5% (w/w) MTC896 Gel
